meanings.definition: Used to give a negative response or refusal.
meanings.sent1: No, I don't want any more candy.
meanings.sent2: She said no to the offer.
meanings.sent3: No, I won't jump off the swing into the mud.
meanings.sent4: The cat meowed a loud 'no' to going outside in the rain.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's 'no' echoed through the classroom, silencing the students.

meanings.sent1: There is no milk left in the fridge.
meanings.sent3: The empty jar had no cookies left.
meanings.sent4: The dark night sky had no stars to be seen.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned house had no signs of life inside.

meanings.sent1: She was no longer interested in the game.
meanings.sent2: He could no longer see the road ahead.
meanings.sent3: The magician's hat was no longer empty after the trick.
meanings.sent4: The once lively party was no longer fun for the tired guests.
meanings.sent5: The old clock could no longer tick, its gears worn out.
